question: In which year was the first robbery for which it is known that Jesse James was responsible, of the Davies's County Savings Association in Gallatin, Missouri, during which Jesse shot and killed the cashier, Captain John Sheets?
vanilla_rag_result: The first robbery for which it is known that Jesse James was responsible occurred in the year 1869, specifically on December 7, when he and Frank James robbed the Daviess County Savings Association in Gallatin, Missouri, during which Jesse shot and killed the cashier, Captain John Sheets.
